recipesJson.name: Castle Long
recipesJson.author: KylezKloudz
recipesJson.description: A tried & true recipe that my wife and I have been using for quite some time now... I can't really remember where I found it to give proper credit (I'm pretty sure it's been cut, copied, and pasted all around the internet at this point) but whoever made this did an excellent job in replicating a delicious e-liquid! Thank you whoever you are! üëçüëç
